title: Renew a Driver's License Online
description: A citizen needs to renew their driver's license and wants to complete the process online.

tasks.description: Identify the citizen using their existing license number and date of birth.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully retrieves the citizen's DMV record.

tasks.description: Verify that the citizen is eligible for online renewal (e.g., no outstanding violations, vision test not required).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the citizen's eligibility for online renewal.

tasks.description: Process the renewal payment and provide a temporary digital license.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully takes payment and issues a temporary license pending mailing of the physical card.
